content.en: Video compression algorithms: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the quality of compressed video sequences and enhance error concealment. These algorithms include spatially adaptive algorithms, block-matching principles, motion compensation, maximum a posteriori estimator, refined motion compensated concealment, directional weighted spatial interpolation, spatial interpolation, temporal prediction techniques, hybrid methods, joint spatial and temporal algorithms, edge-related perceptual considerations, weighted pixel estimator, adaptive block-size pixel replacement, adaptive estimation scheme, motion-compensated temporal filtering, edge direction estimation, linear weighting interpolation, fading scheme, spatio-temporal boundary matching, partial differential equation, and prediction mode of neighboring blocks. These algorithms aim to provide better reconstruction quality, preserve existing edges, recover lost video data, and improve the overall quality of video sequences.
content.da: Videokompressionsalgoritmer: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre kvaliteten af komprimerede videosekvenser og forbedre fejlkorrektion. Disse algoritmer inkluderer spatialt adaptive algoritmer, blok-matching principper, bevægelseskompensation, maksimum a posteriori estimater, forfinet bevægelseskompenseret fejlkorrigering, retningsbestemt vægtet spatial interpolation, spatial interpolation, temporale forudsigelsesteknikker, hybride metoder, fælles spatial og temporal algoritmer, kantrelaterede perceptuelle overvejelser, vægtet pixelestimator, adaptiv blokstørrelse pixeludskiftning, adaptivt estimationsskema, bevægelseskompenseret temporal filtrering, retningsestimation af kanter, lineær vægtning interpolation, fading skema, spatio-temporal grænsematching, partiel differentialligning og forudsigelsestilstand af naboblokke. Disse algoritmer sigter mod at give bedre rekonstruktionskvalitet, bevare eksisterende kanter, genskabe tabte videodata og forbedre den overordnede kvalitet af videosekvenser.
